statements: DELETE FROM production_schedule WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM production_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1 AND progress_percentage > 50;
DELETE FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE product_id = 100 AND progress_status = 'in-progress';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_progress WHERE id = 100 AND product_id = 50;
DELETE FROM production_schedule WHERE production_date < '2023-01-01' AND product_name = 'Widget' AND estimated_quantity >= 100;
DELETE FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE id = 10 AND product_name = 'WidgetXYZ';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name = 'Machine A';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND maintenance_status = 'Pending';
